about-us-content1.title: Introduction
about-us-content1.content: Central Deepwater Port is a leading deepwater port in Central Vietnam, located in Nghi Son Area, Nghi Son District, Thanh Hoa Province. Covering an area of 55 kmÂ², our port is designed to handle vessels up to 200,000 DWT, ranking among the top 10 ports in Vietnam. We take pride in being a key maritime hub, providing a wide range of services including cargo handling, anchorage, inspection, crew support, and transportation, connecting Central Vietnam to global markets.

about-us-content2.title: Our Mission
about-us-content2.content: We are committed to delivering safe, efficient, and sustainable maritime solutions. With a cargo handling capacity of 30,000 tons per day and an 85% customer satisfaction rate, we aim to be the trusted partner for logistics companies, shipowners, and maritime operators worldwide.

about-us-content3.title: Our Vision
about-us-content3.content: Looking ahead, we aspire to build a modern, environmentally friendly, inclusive, and technologically advanced port. Leveraging our strategic location and modern infrastructure, we strive to become a key player in the global maritime industry, driving sustainable growth for the region and beyond.

about-us-contact: Discover the services of Central Deepwater Port to support your maritime and logistics needs. Explore our offerings or contact us today for more details!
